title: 200: Tayshia's FIRST Bachelorette Recap: Ep 5 (Give Tayshia More New Men! + Clare & Dale’s CONFIRMATION!)
itunes:title: 200: Tayshia's FIRST Bachelorette Recap: Ep 5 (Give Tayshia More New Men! + Clare & Dale’s CONFIRMATION!)
description:
The Broads chat about our new Bachelorette’s first official episode (YES!!). First they discuss the Presidential election (0:00-5:00) and then dive into Tayshia meeting the men for the first time! Bekah and Jess chat about the fact that production didn’t provide a full limo entrance for Tayshia, the shake up of the 4 new men, the original crew hating San Diego Spencer, Tayshia’s energy making this season 10x better already, the tired “water basketball” group date, Jason’s true love farewell, their very different opinions on Zac, and their very mutual love of Brendan and his first one-on-one date with Tayshia! And of course they also discuss Chris Harrison’s sit down with Clare and Dale and so much more! 


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
